content: द्वैतं [द्विधा इतं द्वीतं तस्य भावः स्वार्थे अण्] {@--1@} Duality. {@--2@} Dualism in philosophy, the assertion of two distinct principles, such as the maintenance of the doctrine that spirit and matter, Brahman and the universe, or the Individual and the Supreme Soul, are different from each other; <ab>cf.</ab> अद्वैत; किं शास्त्रं श्रवणेन यस्य गलति द्वैतांधकारोत्करः <ls>Bv. 1. 86.</ls> {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of a forest.
